oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Telegram informing Dr. Quintard of Gen. Leonidas Polk's death
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This telegram was sent via The Southern Telegraph Companies from Marietta, Georgia to J.H. Roberts in 1864. Reads "I was requested by Col H. Yeatman to say that he desires you to inform Dr. Quintard immediately that the remains of Lt. Genl Polk will arrive in Atlanta tonight at 2 o'clock. He was killed by caisson shot today. It is uncertain whether the remains will remain in Atlanta or proceed to Augusta." Signed J.H. Simmons.
